fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- **Secret Supply**: You may swap a card you have in your hand in exchange for another non-special card. (2 uses)
- **Frame**: Pick a player, and change their role to appear as any other role. The effect will last 2 rounds. (3 uses)
- **Riot**: Upgrade the next 3 attacking cards played by teammates. (1 use)

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - **Last Stand**: Once you die, you will deal a Powerful attack to a target of your choice.
